item.title: Is this the problem?
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

My server cant get online, i have port forwarded correctly, and got my no-ip working, but still it wont work, and i swear its because of an anti leech.
Is this the problem?

public IOThread() throws IOException { buffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(BUFFER_SIZE); ioClientMap = new HashMap<SocketChannel, IOClient>(); clientMap = new HashMap<SocketChannel, Client>(); revIoClientMap = new HashMap<IOClient, SocketChannel>(); revClientMap = new HashMap<Client, SocketChannel>(); selector = SelectorProvider.provider().openSelector(); serverChannel = ServerSocketChannel.open(); serverChannel.configureBlocking(false); InetSocketAddress iAddress = new InetSocketAddress("0.0.0.0", Constants.PORT); serverChannel.socket().bind(iAddress, BACKLOG); serverChannel.register(selector, SelectionKey.OP_ACCEPT); System.out.println("Ready and listening on port " + Constants.PORT + "."); }

And im talking about the “0.0.0.0.” part.

Read full topic
